description: Fortnightly reflective posts (250-300 words each) on skills, challenges, and placement goals, plus final submissions: a 1000-word reflection on learning outcomes and a 1000-word showcase of key tasks/deliverables with feedback analysis.
Creation of a professional development plan (15%) and completion of three online WIL modules (one discipline-specific, two professional development) with summative quizzes (15% total).
Workplace supervisor's evaluation using a rubric assessing professionalism, motivation, initiative, and workplace contribution.
